Package cofh.lib.item

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAugmentableItem
    A reasonably freeform interface used for handling Augmentation for ItemStack objects.
    IAugmentItem
    This is a purely optional interface for use with Augments to help reduce NBT overhead.
    ICoFHItem
    Hacky default interface to reduce boilerplate.
    IColorableItem  
    IContainerItem
    Marker interface for anything that supports the "Holding" enchantment.
    IMultiModeItem
    Implement this interface on Item classes which have multiple modes - what that means is completely up to you.
    INBTCopyIngredient
    Blank interface only used for checking against in custom recipes where NBT should be transferred to the result.
    IPlacementItem  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArmorMaterialCoFH  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ContainerType
